=== Current Issues with Breezy ===
* Hibernate not well functioning

=== Current Issues with Dapper (Flight 7) ===
* Touchpad scroll button: ??? 
* Card reader works fine with Fuji XD card and Sandisk SD Ultra2, related to new Canon A610
* SLEEP (Fn+Esc) works excellent and speedy (resume= & resume2= in bootline /boot/grub/menu.lst)
